Name: Harvest Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Boozy with notes of spiced apple brandy. A great after-dinner sipper.
Nutrition: One serving of Harvest Cocktail contains 164 calories
